page.title: 07SCHOOL DINNERS - COOK-CHILL
page.content: We get our{school dinners}from Northorpe{Cook-Chill}Production Unit. Twenty eight other schools in Kirklees also have meals delivered from Northorpe. The{refrigerated lorry travels 70 miles every day taking 1800 meals to schools in Huddersfield and the Holme Valley area. 600 of the meals delivered to the Huddersfield schools are prepared to special recipes for{Asian children. Today we had:- Fish Fingers, Chipped Potatoes and Baked Beans. Followed by Fruit Pie and Custard. The Fish Fingers and Fruit Pie are bothed cooked and chilled at Northorpe before being delivered, but the chips ann custard are{freshly cooked}at our school by the cook in charge.
